pages.text: $(#630000)Crafted from Factory Viscera, this item dramatically increases the effectiveness of Carcasses, causing them to lower several Evolution Phases when used. It's also another reason to not spend time around humans.

$(#630000)It requires complete darkness to be used, and it cannot be used during a global cooldown. Holding it in the offhand while using a Carcass will consume the item, reducing the Evolution Phase and severely damaging parasites in a 10 chunk radius.$(br)Parasites within 5 chunks of the blast will have their ability to adapt to damage sources completely disabled, and within half that distance they will be stunned as well.
